abstract: A short film made by The Commonwealth Film Unit in 1968, shot by Ron Taylor, renowned underwater cinematographer and marine environmentalist.
description: Shows some of the scientific observations of the Heron Island research staion on the Great Barrier Reef. Illustrates in detail the birds, fish and mammals of the area.
